meanings.sent1: He felt dorkier than usual in his oversized glasses.
meanings.sent2: She always wears the dorkier outfits with mismatched socks.
meanings.sent3: The dorkier he dressed, the more his friends laughed good-naturedly.
meanings.sent4: His dorkier sense of humor made everyone smile brighter.
meanings.sent5: The dorkier he acted, the more endearing he became to others.

meanings.sent1: The dorkier jokes he made always brought laughter to the group.
meanings.sent2: Her dorkier tendencies included collecting comic books and action figures.
meanings.sent3: His dorkier dance moves never failed to entertain at parties.
meanings.sent4: The dorkier glasses he wore seemed to magnify his enthusiasm.
meanings.sent5: In a room full of cool kids, his dorkier charm stood out the most.
